description: This table contains a daily history of active product devices and trips for external organizations

schema.name: product_id
schema.description: The internal ID of the Samsara product

schema.name: total_devices_heartbeats
schema.description: The total number of product devices that had an active heartbeat on 'date'

schema.name: total_devices_trips
schema.description: The total number of product devices with at least one trip on 'date'
